Learn More

Who are we?

We are a group at the University of Ottawa which is dedicated to extracurricular programming and system administration projects. You can find us on Facebook, Twitter, GitHub, and Slack.

  • Facebook
  • Slack
  • Twitter
  • GitHub

CSGames

CS Games 2018 season is about to start, and we need some competitive uOttawa students to join us. We are looking for uOttawa students who love to program and want to push their skills to new limits. You haven't heard of CS Games? That's ok. One of the best parts about it is that you don't need any previous hackathon or competition experience.

If you are interested in sponsoring our team, please email us at CSGames@uOCSClub.ca
